name: DLN
description: Experience native cross-chain trading with deep liquidity, advanced limit orders, and lightning-fast execution. Powered by deBridge
chains_supported: Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Polygon PoS, Avalanche...
auction_design_details: The first accepted solver bid automatically wins the auction irrespective of whether another bid comes in at roughly the same time with a better price or outcome for the user
auction_openness_details: Auctions occur entirely on chain with no auction period of shielded competition window and there are no preferential Filler selection mechanisms.
filler_permissionlessness_details: DLN allows any participant to perform Filling actions and provides comprehensive code (https://github.com/debridge-finance/dln-taker) to get Fillers up and running quickly.
censorship_resistance_details: There are no mechanisms on-chain by which the protocol can prevent an order from being filled (assuming it hasn't been already).
filler_failure_resistance_details: If an order remains unfulfilled for a prolonged period of time for whatever reason, there is a mechanism to cancel the order and receive the funds back on the source chain. (See https://docs.dln.trade/dln-api/quick-start-guide/cancelling-the-order).
